author: Herald Staff
title: Herald heroes
text:
Herald heroes Herald Staff Monday, October 26, 2015 comments Tweet OFFENSE — Riley Cote, QB, Curry. Freshman hit on 24-of-35 passes for 351 yards and four touchdowns, and added two rushing scores as the Colonels upset Coast Guard, 42-14.
DEFENSE — Lawrence Gonzalez, DB, Endicott. Senior from Bedford returned an interception 45 yards for a touchdown, his second straight game with a pick-six, as the Gulls thumped Maine Maritime, 37-14.
SPECIAL TEAMS — Jose Depadua and Brandon Owens, Bryant. Depadua, a senior, returned a kickoff 93 yards for a touchdown, and Owens, a junior from Salem and BC High, returned a blocked punt 16 yards for a TD as the Bulldogs edged St. Francis, 26-24.
